item.title: Malcolm Hicks, Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe and General Counsel
item.description:
On October 23, 2015, I receive an email from Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> who is the Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe.

From: Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com>

Subject: France Monopoly Game Query

Date received: October 23, 2015 at 05:34 +0800 (Beijing time)

To: Vincent B. Le Corre
